components.name: Frontend
components.description: React SPA that handles user interactions, authentication UI, and communicates with the backend via REST/GraphQL.

components.name: Backend API
components.description: Go/Node.js service that implements business logic, authentication, request routing, and orchestrates calls to the database, vector store, and LLM APIs.

components.name: PostgreSQL Database
components.description: Relational database storing user data, application metadata, and structured logs.

components.name: Vector Store (Weaviate)
components.description: Vector database for storing embeddings and performing similarity searches.

components.name: LLM Service
components.description: External large language model APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.) used for generating responses and embeddings.

data_flows.description: User submits input via browser; data sent over HTTPS.
API requests for authentication, data retrieval, and LLM invocation.
CRUD operations for user profiles, app configs, and audit logs.
Store and query embeddings for similarity search.
Send prompts and receive generated text or embeddings.
Return generated content to be processed or stored.
